names.name: Jehovah Elohim
names.description: The Divine Name associated with Binah, signifying the aspect of God that shapes form and structure.

names.name: Tzaphkiel
names.description: Known as the 'Contemplation of God', this archangel represents understanding and the contemplative aspects of the divine.

names.name: Aravot
names.description: The order of angels associated with Binah, representing the concept of the enclosure or womb of creation.

names.name: Saturn
names.description: The planetary influence associated with Binah, embodying time, limitation, and form.

names.name: Aimah (Mother)
names.description: Symbolic attribution to Binah, referring to the archetypal feminine or maternal energy in the divine structure, the nurturing aspect that gives form.

names.name: Mara
names.description: A name reflecting the sorrow and understanding of the complexities and challenges of creation.
